course_description: From prehistory to today, pathogens have played a central role in our existence. This course will provide insights into why we get sick and how we heal by examining human disease within the context of ecology and evolution. Required for ENVS BS/MPH students.
prerequisites: This course requires ENVS 131 or ENVS_OX 131 or  BIOL_OX 111 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite OR permission of instructor.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 7178, Section #: 9000, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Staff, Status: Closed
